primaryHost.about:
Pour les Parisiens d’un jour et de toujours. 
Dès votre arrivée sur les lieux la clé vous sera remise par notre hôte qui pourra également vous fournir des conseils pour faire de votre séjour un moment d’exception et profiter de Paris l'esprit léger ! Gardez l’œil ouvert, cette chambre est faite pour les amoureux du détail. Elle saura vous plonger dans une ambiance décontractée et chic pour une pause en toute tranquillité à quelques pas seulement des Champs Elysées.
Le saviez-vous ?
la “plus belle avenue du monde”, ne l’a pas toujours été…
Ancienne terre marécageuse, l’avenue était mal-aimée des parisiens. Mal fréquentée la journée, obscure la nuit, elle enjambait le cours de l’ancien Grand-Égout de Paris. Autant d’éléments qui ne donnaient pas particulièrement envie à la population de flâner le long de cette avenue…
Puis de beaux hôtels particuliers se construisent dans la rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, galeries d’arts et de grandes marques automobiles feront de cette avenue une légende.

Accès des voyageurs
En résidant avec nous, vous aurez accès à notre espace lounge, notre bibliothèque, et à notre jardin sauvage.
Échanges avec les voyageurs
Réception 24h/24
Bagagerie
Wifi gratuit
Honesty Bar
Restaurant
Ascenseur
Hôtel non-fumeur
Animaux non acceptés
Prestation de ménage quotidienne
Heure d’arrivée : 15h / Heure de départ : 12h

------------------------

Parisian daylong or lifelong

At your arrival, our host will welcome you and will give you all the key to make your stay as memorable as possible. All you have to do is to enjoy Paris with happy thoughts! Keep open your eyes, this room is made for persons fine aesthetic sensibility and devotion to detail. It will know how to plunge you into a relaxed and smart atmosphere for a break, closed to the famous « Avenue Champs-Elysées ».

Did you know ?
The " most beautiful avenue of the world ", was not always like that…
Old swampland, the avenue was unloved by Parisian. Badly frequented the day, dark at night, it stepped over the Big Sewer of Paris. So many elements which did not particularly tempt the population to stroll along this avenue …
Then beautiful hotels are built in the Faubourg Saint-Honoré street, art galleries and famous automobile brands will make this avenue, a legend.

Travelers access and services :
By living with us, you will have access to our lounge space, our library, and to our wild garden.
Storage room

Luggage room
Free WiFi
Honesty Bar
Restaurant

Non-smoking hotel
Not accepted animals
Daily domestic service
Arrival time: 15 hours(3 pm) / Departure time: 12 hours

reviews.comments: Overall decent place, good value for money

The rooms have air conditioned and the beds were comfortable and set up worked for our family of five in one room.

name: Lovely apartment 2 BR / Paris 11eme

reviews.comments:
Fantastic location, however, that was the only good thing to come from my experience here.

The only satisfaction I will take from my time here will be people reading this review and deciding to stay somewhere else. And I would be weary of any Airbnb which is operated by Check my Guest.

My partner and I had booked 6nights, coming from New Zealand. We arrived to find there was no internet which is extremely crucial for overseas travel, especially when you’ve come from the other-side of the world.

The next two days we spent calling the help line to try and get it sorted. Each time we spoke to someone different who told us the exact same thing. “Unplug from the power” “someone will be there to fix it” it was the most impersonal and frustrating experience. Finally, late on Sunday someone came around, only to be told they couldn’t fix it and a team would be here to fix it tomorrow. Of course, nobody turned up.

Tuesday, the last day before check out I was fed up. Again I got someone different on the helpline who said exactly what our previous conversations had consisted of. I was furious with the incompetence of this company. They sent someone here who fixed it and it stopped working immediately.

Finally, I called the manager. She had the nerve to blame to me by saying “what had I touched” which is absolutely infuriating considering we had no wifi the the entire stay.

I will give a shout out to one women employee who I spoke to twice on the phone, Alicia. She stayed true to her word and when she said something was going to happen it would. She was calm and empathic towards our situation and kept me from losing my cool on multiple occasions. She was real a one. Thank you.

This apartment is on the first floor, behind the stairs through the backdoor. While it is 11th arr., you can't beat the price for a place to stay for 6 people. There is not enough room for everyone to sit down and eat at the table, which really only comfortable fits 3. That being said, the neighborhood felt safe, the boulangerie, fruit stand, and Fran Prix are all right around the corner, and the responsiveness of the host was great. This place is best for a group of 4 or fewer, but it can work for 6 people if you are out all day exploring. There is street noise, nothing atypical. Great price, clean place!

Joffrey’s place is perfect for any short stays in Paris. A quick ride to all the big train stations and a short walk to Notre Dame. Really cool. It gets pretty hot and there’s not great airflow since it’s on the bottom floor. He’d messaged me that they were going to get a fan there but did not by the end of my stay (wasn’t a huge deal). The only other thing that was a bit weird is that the used towels and rags were just thrown in one of the cupboards and there weren’t trash bags that fit the bins.

I would definitely recommend for any young travelers to Paris who need two private rooms for a reasonable price and don’t mind (extremely minor) issues. Thanks, Joffrey!

The apartment is nice but a bit smaller than the pictures might have you believe and could benefit from a few little touches (there was only 2 wine glasses and nothing to wash them up with for example!)

It is in a great location, close to lots of restaurants and cafes.

Super comfy beds! Perfect as a base for exploring Paris.
the apartment was clean and nice but it was smaller than i thought and it was a little bit too hot with only one window in the bedroom.

It was very beautiful the place is convenient and clean. It is on the ground floor so you can hear people walking by and cars driving.The shower fills up with water. There wasn't a window to open so when it's hot is stays hot. No dish soap or a dishcloth. But we really enjoyed our stay and we would defenitely book it again!

name: Boutique Hôtel au pied des Jardins du Luxembourg

reviews.comments:
I booked pretty spontaneously and had a great stay, the staff was very friendly and helpful.

The room wasn't huge, but it didn't feel cramped either. On the other hand the bathroom, that you enter through a tiny door was rather spacious and fairly recently renovated.

Depending on the room you can see the Jardin du Luxembourg through the windows. Notre Dame, Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Pont Neuf and other sights and parts of the inner city are easily reachable on foot.

An amazing place to stay while being very reasonably priced. If we come back to Paris, we'll be back here as well.

reviews.comments: Deuxième séjour dans ce beau petit hôtel. Je tiens à saluer particulièrement le sens aigu de la relation client. Non seulement j'ai eu la chance d'avoir une chambre mais surtout l'hôtel a fait un vrai geste commercial puisque je n'ai pas eu de supplément à payer. Cette nouvelle chambre était aussi cosy et confortable (la literie est top, la salle de bains aussi) que la précédente. L'accueil est parfait et le petit déjeuner très bon et copieux et d'un excellent rapport Q/P. Je reviendrai et je recommande.

localizedReview.comments: Second time staying at this beautiful little hotel. I want to especially say hello to the keen customer relationship. This new room was as cozy and comfortable (the bedding is great, the bathroom too) as the previous one. The welcome is perfect and the breakfast is very good and hearty and excellent Q/P ratio. I will come back and recommend it.

reviews.comments: This place was in a great location and building felt really safe. Been to Paris multiple times and this time was my favourite as I felt like we were in with the locals due to the location. A few things to touch on, I asked for earlier check in but this was not possible however I was told I could bring my luggage to the apartment earlier and leave it there. I messaged a time that I would arrive and the host said I was to message when I got there. When I got there I messaged and got no reply? Thankfully the cleaner was in who looked confused but she was lovely and took in our luggage anyway. There was also no full length mirror in the apartment, one of our pillows has no pillow case, there was no hand towel in the toilet and we had to re-use our towels for 3 days as we only had one each.  We could also hear everything the neighbours were saying through the vents and woke us up by playing music at midnight. The location was the best part for us.
reviews.response: Dear Molly, thank you for your review and sorry again for the inconvenience of the music in the neighborhood. It will be a pleasure to welcome you again. Wishing you a nice day.

name: Superb apartment in the heart of Paris

reviews.comments:
Pros: convenient location, facing a quiet courtyard for a good night sleep, comfortable bed and pillows, in a building with an elevator, clean apartment.

Cons: Communication was not the best or the quickest. I followed the instructions provided and informed the host of our arrival time well in advance, but had to follow up several times via Airbnb message, text, AND email for a response. Upon our arrival, we had to wait an additional 30 mins for the host to arrive to the building. In addition, the cleaner was still not done when we arrived to the apartment, so we waited an additional 5-10 mins in the hallway. The day before checkout, I received a text asking us to place the linens in a pink bag. I could not locate the bag and asked where to find this. The host did not reply back.

Overall, the apartment was fine and suited our needs. The check-in could have been smoother but it didn’t ruin our stay. However, if you’re looking for a communicative host, I would look somewhere else.
We had a great time staying here for our first trip to Paris. It is wonderfully located and a great place to rest your head in between exploring the city.

Great location
Photo makes the apartment appear larger than it really truly is, very small

The bed is comfortable and the kitchen is super useful for quick snacks. Just a heads up that there was no toilet paper which I understand to be relatively standard for Airbnbs in paris but would be very odd for Americans.

The host met us with a key and a quick tour of the place. Cute and cozy space in a great location. Walking distance to many restaurants, shops, cafés, pharmacies. The Airbnb has everything you would need for cooking; cookware, utensils, seasonings, etc. Nice size mini fridge and freezer. Also comes with a washer. Nice tall windows. Highly recommend this space.

J'ai fait des études dans la photographie et je connais donc pleins de reKoins magnifiques où vous pourrez découvrir la photographie parisienne… Alors, vous avez envie de faire une virée insolite ?

reviews.comments:
Cute little place right in the busy heart of the Latin Quarter.
I was surprised at how Central this was. Literally walk out the door and into the bars and restaurants below.
Comfortable, clean. Could do with a little detailing like plants in the planters on the balcony, a few noises and creaks as old building. Bring ear plugs.

I would stay again.
Thanks
Lovely place, great location, helpful and kind staff.

Very clean and very well located
Rooms are extremely small and walls are very thin
Super séjour hôtel très agréable. Je recommande vivement. Prestation de qualité

primaryHost.about:
Bonjour, 

Je suis Farouk et je suis  à la direction de cet hôtel depuis plusieurs années. Toutes les équipes de l'hôtel sont entièrement dévouées à vous offrir un service personnalisé. Vous trouverez quelqu'un 24h/24 et vous serez toujours bien conseillé pour vos visites ou vos déplacements. 
L'Hôtel Europe Saint Séverin est un petit hôtel de charme au coeur du quartier Saint Michel, l'ambiance y est familiale et chaleureuse. Ici, tout est fait pour que vous vous sentiez à l'aise.
N'hésitez pas à nous appeler directement à l'hôtel, ce serait un plaisir de vous renseigner.

name: Bed & Breakfast bucolic in the heart of Paris
roomType: Private room in bed and breakfast

reviews.comments:
Claire was the quintessential host. She was clear and responsive in her communications before my arrival. She was flexible when snow delayed my stay by a day. Since the rail strike was on the weekend I was leaving, she arranged a car to get me to the airport and helped me to realize that I didn't have to wake as early as I anticipated to get to the airport on time.

She had great recommendations and was present and friendly at breakfast but also gave me plenty of space to enjoy Paris and my time away.

Breakfasts were tasty and varied in a very cute dining area. My stay was incredibly quiet with absolutely no street noise despite being in a neighborhood with lots to see within walking distance.

name: Chambre Double Classique | Hôtel Duquesne Eiffel

reviews.comments: Great location and wonderful staff. Very nice stay there!
Nice hotel, pretty pricy. But nice staff
Wonderful location.  Very clean and quaint and very friendly.   Highly recommend.

No where in any of the listing did it mention our room would look out into an inner courtyard that served as a mechanic shop. Between this and construction in the neighboring building, it wasn’t a pleasant stay.

The room was insanely small and while that can be the norm for much older hotel buildings, it was never disclosed. Every photo on the listing shows a view of the Eiffel Tower…the shower head was broken (wouldn’t stay upright), and some of the bedding had stains I’d rather not guess where they are from
Great staff! Super friendly and helpful. Room was great as well. Its also near tons of great places to eat and you can see the Eiffel tower from just outside the hotel. I would stay here again :)
For my first time in Paris, this hotel was great. Convenient location, comfortable room with a view of of the Eiffel Tower and staff were very friendly.

Great location, nice accommodations. The staff is very attentive and really made sure we were comfortable the entire stay. I will definitely stay here again and  would recommend to anyone  who visits Paris. Close to the Eiffel Tower. Metro line 8 is also very nearby.
Perfect location for a quick transit through Paris. A bit small but balanced with location and affordability.

This boutique hotel is so charming. Right in the heart of Paris and minutes from the Eiffel Tower, this could not be a better location. The staff are wonderful and extremely accommodating.  The room was cozy and all that I needed. Very comfortable, clean and quiet. The best part is that the value is INCREDIBLE! Nothing is a deal these days so this was a welcomed surprise! I would definitely recommend it and I would certainly book for myself again.

primaryHost.about:
Un seul mot d’ordre à l’hôtel : votre satisfaction !

Chaque membre de l’équipe a d’abord été recruté pour ses qualités humaines et s’efforcera de vous servir chaque jour dans la joie et la bonne humeur ! C’est la raison pour laquelle, je crois pouvoir affirmer qu’il règne à l’hôtel une ambiance particulière dont nous sommes fiers. Vous faire partager notre passion pour Paris, nos coup de cœurs, nos bonnes adresses, satisfaire vos envies, parler de choses et d’autres … Voilà ce qui nous donne le sourire au quotidien !

Bienvenue chez vous !

name: Superbe Chambre pour deux dans le centre de Paris

reviews.comments:
Un hôtel incroyable !

Une chambre merveilleuse, un lit très confortable, une salle de bains spacieuse.

La salle de sport est un plus ! Il manque peut-être quelques haltères légères pour les petits bras comme les miens.

La terrasse est top!

Je recommande.
reviews.response:
Chère Madame Guelorget,
Toute l'équipe tient à vous remercier pour ce commentaire plus que chaleureux ! Nous mettons tout en œuvre pour vous satisfaire du mieux que possible.
Nous espérons vous revoir très bientôt à l'Hôtel Opéra Liège.
Prenez soin de vous, à bientôt.

localizedReview.comments:
An amazing hotel!

A wonderful room, a very comfortable bed, a spacious bathroom.

Gym is a plus ! It may be missing some light weights for small arms like mine.

The terrace is great!

I recommend it.
localizedReview.response:
Dear Ms. Guelorget,
The whole team would like to thank you for this very warm review! We do everything we can to accommodate you as best we can.
We hope to see you at the Hôtel Opéra Liège very soon.
Stay safe, see you soon.

primaryHost.about: Découvrez l'Opéra Liège, un hôtel unique qui vous offre la proximité des nombreux monuments de la capitale mais aussi le calme et l'exclusivité au travers de ses nombreux espaces : le rooftop, le bar, le lounge... L’hôtel particulier du XVIIIe a retrouvé son éclat et sa modernité, sous le signe de la lumière et du végétal. Le porche franchi, venez profiter du calme de nos chambres et dégustez un cocktail sur notre rooftop, le Sky Garden.

name: Studio****  18m2 au coeur de Paris quartier Opéra

reviews.comments: Room was small, but comfortable. Lacks any concrete dining area. Furniture is in need of replacement and shows signs of wear, and crevices and air vent were very dusty. Staff was wonderfully kind and location was excellent, I just wish the property was better maintained.
nice location and reasonable priced

Excellent location for shopping— grocery store just around the corner.
Simple room design, not fancy but that won’t matter when you start walking to all the wonderful places just out the door. The staff is very helpful and nice!
Everything was perfect !

Beautiful houses - Very organized company - Replies fast.
Full Recommended.

Rooms are way smaller than expected and we had to ask for another cleaning as the room was still kind of dirty when we arrived.
Besides that, the location is great and the staff is very very friendly.
Can't say anything about the food, as we didn't order it.
I had a great stay. Great location and the staff is friendly.

Chambre chaleureuse, environnement animé, commerce, restaurant
Mais très calme le soir

Warm room, lively environment, shopping, restaurant

reviews.comments: Des Voleurs tout simplement

primaryHost.about:
Vivre un séjour touristique qui concilie autonomie, liberté et services hôteliers.
Nous vous invitons à venir découvrir les villes françaises, leurs monuments, leurs musées et les nombreux sites touristiques en séjournant dans nos résidences hôtelières présentes dans toute la France.
En couple, en famille ou entre amis, pour une nuit ou plusieurs jours, venez séjourner dans l’un de nos établissements et optez pour la liberté que vous offrent nos appartements entièrement équipés avec un espace cuisine, de 2 à 6 personnes.


Nos équipes accueillantes et attentives veillent au bon déroulement de votre séjour et mettent tout en œuvre pour vous satisfaire.
Nous vous souhaitons d’agréables moments chez Residhome Apparthotels.

« Soyez comme chez vous ! », dans un cadre spacieux, convivial et sécurisé tout en bénéficiant de services hôteliers : salle petit déjeuner, réception, Wi-Fi gratuit, ménage...

name: Chambre de charme à deux pas de l'Etoile

reviews.comments: Dear Francois, thank you for accommodating us at such short notice. Our stay in your place was fantastic. The location was perfect, so close to all the main attractions and Charles de Gaulle Etoile metro rail. The area is also really nice and we felt safe. The concierge at the front desk was so welcoming and made us feel at home, they also kept our luggage prior to check in and after our check out so that we could maximize our time exploring Paris. There was also a cellphone in the hotel room which was available for us to use free of charge so that we had internet access during our exploration of the city, this was a big plus! We were unfortunately leaving when there was protest action around Arc de Triomphe and Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro rail was closed and the concierge helped book us a taxi at an affordable rate so that we could make it to the airport in time. Thank you so much for our great stay!
reviews.response:
Thank you very much Luke !
we are happy you loved staying with us
kind regards

reviews.comments: Hidden gem steps away from Arc de Triomphe. Highly recommended.
reviews.response: thank you Yuka for your very kind review !

primaryHost.about:
Bonjour !
Je suis propriétaire et exploitant de l'hôtel Balmoral. 
Hôtelier depuis de nombreuses années, j'aurai plaisir à vous accueillir chez moi, avec mon équipe, pour vous faire passer le meilleur des moments possibles à Paris.
Nous serons tous heureux de vous aider à découvrir notre capitale. 
Je vous souhaite un excellent séjour à l'hôtel Balmoral Paris Champs Elysées.

name: Luxurious Room in the heart of Paris

reviews.comments: Very friendly staff. The rooms on the top floor have a nice view out over the Paris rooftops and the sun in the morning. Not the place for tall people but that may be the case in most of Paris! And adds to the queryness of the room which appeals to me :)

name: Cosy studio! 15min from the Eiffel Tower

photos.caption: Vue sur la rue des Acacias

name: Chic Superior Double Room
☀ Superbe T5 refait avec goût ☀15min Paris/CDG ☀

reviews.comments: Very spacious and well kept! Cloé was super quick with responses and any questions I had. She was very accommodating. Wonderful stay, next to a lot of grocery stores and bakeries!

The location of the flat is great and the space is nicely decorated. Super convenient if you require access to the exhibition centre.

Unfortunately we found that only the shower in the en suite was usable due to the main shower leaking. The house rules listed quite severe penalties for using towels to dry the floor and consequently we all had to use the one bathroom or spend time mopping the floor (not ideal as we were there on a business trip).

It could well be seasonal and common to the area, but there were quite a lot of mosquitos so I would recommend bringing some spray if you are susceptible to bites.

If the above issues were addressed we would stay again.
perfect spot for a nice stayover with friends. clean apartment. all you need is there or can be bought at the small plaza infront of the house :)
Very good service and very helpful!
Good place to stay. liked it.

Nice apartment, very clean and neat. Really liked the decorations!

Also it’s self check-in so that’s great as well.

Overall a great stay.

Cloé was an excellent host and always on the end a phone if we had any queries. Close to the station meant that we were able to explore Paris easily. Highlight of the trip was having a Patisserie on our doorstep. The apartment had everything you need and was kept beautifully. This was the perfe t place for our girls trip. Highly recommended. Thank youwo derful Cloé and Roland.
Lovely modern apartment in an ideal location

It was a  tastefully decorated flat easily accessible from the airport and Gare du Nord. We only stayed there for 2 nights, and with the checkout being at 4 pm and an early check out at 10 am, it felt very short. A slightly later checkout would have been preferable and we would have felt less rushed. I received 3 reminders about the actual checkout time, which I didn’t think was necessary and made us feel a bit under pressure. Any late check out would have been charged at an extra night. Cloé was kind enough and allowed us to store our luggage in the flat until the next guests checked in. While the flat is close to a metro station, if you miss your last metro from the city, it can cost you around €100 by Uber to get home, so pls be mindful of that.

photos.caption: Séjour avec cheminée feu de bois
salle de bain avec fenêtre  + lave linge
cuisine équipée ouverte sur le sejour

name: 150 m M. Robespierre ligne 9/duplex avec roof top

reviews.comments: The apartment was well appointed and clean.  And had good access to the metro into Paris.

This was our best apartment ever, the same as on the pictures, or even better. It was super comfortable for a group of 4 people. Apartment, with modern design, amazing private roof, with great view,  sunsets, fireplace in a living room which we used with a great pleasure, fully furnished, very close to the metro! We liked it really a lot! We found everything we needed. We even didn’t want to get out of the apartment in order to see Paris. Everything worked perfectly. We fall in love with this apartment and would like to return back in the future! Jacques is very friendly host, he helped us a lot with bbq on the roof, brought wood for a fireplace(it was not the season for it, but he brought everything for it), was online with us all the time. I highly recommend this apartment! Thank you a lot for such a hospitality!
Very Modern and well designed space, everything have a propose. Loved the concrete/ wood integration. Would stay here again.

We stayed one week in Jacques' modern apartment and we really enjoyed it.
The apartment is placed in a nice area. Close to the Metro (and by that to Paris city and the various attractions) and with supermarket, baker and restaurants within very short distance.
We can really recommend a stay at Jacques.
Furthermore Jacques responded very fast on any question, we had.

It was a perfect stay.

The place feels absolutely human, warm and actively used by its owner, not unlike many other places. Communication and access was as simple as you'd like it to be.

I love the neighbourhoud: it felt very chill and familly oriented.

Cozy, stylish, light-full, clean, fully equipped place to stay.
Highly recommended

Spacious apartment in a great location, close to markets and trains. Beds were comfortable and it had a nice balcony with a view of the city. Loved that it had 2 bathrooms!  The apartment had everything we needed and would stay here again.
The best apartment i have stayed at in Paris so far.  If you like design, this is the perfect apartment for you!
reviews.response: thank  you andrie , see you next year

reviews.comments: Amazing place !! Loved the rooftop terrace and fireplace. The space is lovely and the host is great !

name: 2 BDR in center of PARIS

reviews.comments: This place is quaint and cute, with a great location and comfy beds! Would recommend!
The room is super clean, strategic location. The host is super helpful definitely will stay at this place again

The apartment was in a great location, and we were able to drop of our luggage early on day 1 which was very helpful.
Unfortunately we had an issue with the cleanliness of the apartment, particularly the beds. The Airbnb support team had to assist us (and they were very helpful).

The location was great- just a five minute walk from two metro stations and a short walk to many restaurants and shops.  The central location in the 2nd arrondissement was perfect for exploring city sights, most of which were within walking distance.  The check-in process was not as smooth as I would have liked- I did not receive check-in instructions, so I had to call a provided phone number.  No one answered the first few times, but after about 20 minutes someone arrived with a key and let us into the apartment.  The foyer and stairs to the second floor are being renovated, so that area was a bit rough looking, but the apartment was neat and tidy.  The apartment was well supplied with everything described on the site and the beds were comfortable, including the pull out couch.  Overall, it was a great place for three friends to stay while visiting Paris.

On the good note:
- Great location.
- Styled nicely.
- Clean bedsheets and towels.
- Has all kitchen utensils and basic toilettries(shampoo, soap and toilet paper).
- Hot water, fans and heaters available.
- Smart TV with netflix available.
- Easy check-in and check-out.

On the other hand…
- First impression on the building wasn’t pleasant, cluttered and with a lot of garbage on plain sight.
- Apartment floor and bathroom were dirty. We were told someone would come clean and it never happened.
- Needs maintenance on several things.
- TV shelf & nightstand shelves were about to fall off the walls or missing.
- Left hand-side bedroom’s door handle was faulty and the bed felt like it was going to break due to missing support under the mattress.
- Bathroom door gets stuck and needs to be pushed in order to get out. Strong plumbing smell.
- Since the shower does not have a door, the floor gets pretty wet while you shower.
- Noisy neighbors despite high ceilings.

It seems that the owners did not do a walk through before renting the apartment or else they would’ve noticed and cared to fix/solve everything mentioned above. The apartment needs a little love and effort in order to make it a great stay. Hopefully reviews are taken into account because I believe it has a lot of potential.
OK
Great location. Small but very comfortable.
The location is amazing but recommend not utilizing the couch as a bed unless you don’t plan on spending time in the living room, since it’s very small

name: Magnifique appartement quartier montmartre

reviews.comments: Great apartment awesome location - highly recommended

We were so lucky to stay at Faycal’s place. The neighbourhood is wonderful with great restaurants around the corner. Close to the metro and we had great walks around the area. We enjoyed sitting in the lovely courtyard. The place was perfect for our needs. We made breakfast and a few dinners in the kitchen and great Wi-Fi. Our kids enjoyed relaxing in the apartment and having their own room.
Communication with Faycal was fast, easy and incredibly friendly. We would love to return in the future.

Clean and spacious- had breakfast in courtyard watching people pass and feeling like a local; accomodated 5; Great location- Sacre Coeur complex visible above from the street, Supermarket 2 min walk, bus and metro around the corner.
Great location for a sweet evening

We had a great stay at Faycal’s place and would definitely stay again. I’ve been to Paris many times but could never afford to stay within the periphery. Staying inside it makes all the difference in the experience, so definitely worth it!
Communication was fast and the location was great! Faycal was very nice and understanding! I highly recommend going up the hill for restaurants instead of down. We ended up loving Le Gabin for dinner. Only a short walk. The beef was amazing!
Very accommodating and helpful, would certainly recommend!

Highly recommended! Cozy appartment with a great patio. Close to the Sacre Coeur and Metro and in the neighborhood there are many small shops and cafés. The communication was very good and the check-in so easy! We had a great stay!

The apartment is located very well. It’s the best place to stay according price/quality.
Faycal is friendly and helpful. Self Check-in was fast and comfortable.

Great apartment, cosy and clean. Great shower! This apartment is close to everything you will need. We stayed for 5 days and we felt that staying in Montmartre, so close the Sacré-Cœur,  that we saw some of the real, authentic Paris.

name: 10 minutes walking from Montmartre

reviews.comments: Lubomir made us feel very welcome, thank you for letting us stay at your apartment :)
Very comfortable apt. Beds are great, wish the apt. had a TV. Ludomir is excellent answering promptly.
Really enjoyed staying in Lubomir's place, thanks for being such a good host! Bettina

It’s a very pretty apartment in a good spot to get around Paris via metro or walking if you want to visit Montparnasse. Also only 2 stops or from Gare du Nord. The sofa bed is comfortable and the shower amazing. It was perfect for us and I am sure we will be back.
reviews.response: Thank you very much, Caroline! Was a pleasure to have you as a guest and to discuss with you. Greetings

reviews.comments: Clean, compact flat with everything we needed. Very quiet and comfortable beds.
this was an all around successful stay in Paris with a nice and fine accommodation. Many thanks
loved the apartment, quiet, well appointed.
Great host - super responsive and a fabulous apartment. Would stay again for sure - thank you.
Very friendly host. It’s very quiet around the house. Very nice recommendations for  restaurants. Nice trip.

primaryHost.about: Mi chiamo Lyubomir! Sono architetto e lavoro tra Parigi e Milano.

name: A deux pas de la Tour Eiffel,  service inclus !

reviews.comments: Our stay was good. Very central.
Such a pretty place in a great area!

It was a great way to stay. Warm, clean and cozy. The room was a lot bigger then in other hotels and the staff was friendly and helpful.
Very convenient place to visit a lot of other places in Paris. On Sunday there is a wonderful farmers market directly in front of the hotel where you can buy delicious foods to bring home. The Eiffel Tower you can reach by foot and 2 great bakeries are just around the corner.
We will come back for sure.
Great location! We stayed here on an overnight layover and even walked to the Eiffel Tower from here. Everyone was very helpful and kind.
The room was in a great location, just as advertised, and perfect for solo traveling. I’ll likely stay again when next I’m in Paris solo.

One of the best and cleanest hotels I ever visited. The receptionist were truly kind and helpful when it comes to give us information about the stay and the city. It was my first time visiting Paris and I had just 2 days and 1 night to meet places, this hotel made everything easier. It’s located at 10 min walk from the Eiffel Tour and 2 minutes walk from the metro. I love the fact that they hold our bags in the hotel for free after the check out. That was a great services which we take advantage of it to lighting visit other places in the city.

Lovely little hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Super easy check in at the front desk and it is located close to many major attractions including a 15 min walk to the Eiffel Tower and a two minute walk to the metro. The area might not appear too great, but it is. It’s a lot safer than it appear and everyone is incredibly friendly.
Great location. Close to Eiffel Tower, restaurants and shopping. Good value. Would stay there again!
Great location, clean rooms and friendly staff!!!

primaryHost.about: J'aime découvrir d'autres civilisations,  j'aime les voyages, la lecture, les ballades en ville.

name: Meslay 7

reviews.comments: Nice apartment for a family of 4, everything close by (15 Minute walk). Very quiet apartment, felt safe.
Great apartment with a perfect location in République. Good choice for a weekend stay!

The apt was located in a good area for walking and seeing the sites The apt was an adequate size for 2-4 people and was quiet
Basic cleanliness was ok
Quick response was good

The appartement is well located.

Toilet did not work for the first day which was obviously a big issue.

Communication was quick.

Cleanliness can be improved and a general touch up to make it feel fresher (for example wardrobe’s back is broken and just left leaning to the wall). I would also recommend investing in new pillows as they were a bit on a tougher side but that’s individual preference I guess.

Overall I would say the flat is what I expected in terms of price/quality for Paris.
Laurent was very accommodating for a last minute reservation. Great location
Prime location for a weekend in the city. The hosts L&L are pro’s!
it's a good apartment in an amazing area. the host is available to answer you quickly. just cleaning would be improved

This is a nice flat in a central location, and quiet too. It is simple and very compact for four guests so best if you’re not planning to spend much time in. Couple of issues with facilities which I am sure will be fixed!

Thank you, Laurent and Lisa.

Family of 4, two teens- 5’11 and 6’6. We were worried about the pullout couch for our boys but it was bigger then expected and worked well. Our room was comfortable with AC for some of the hottest nights in Paris (July 2022) - just be sure to pull the unit ahead as far as it will go to get air flowing in the living room and bedroom.

Comfortable beds, Fridge worked well, we ate out everyday so did not make use of the stove 😀(vacation cooking break), glassware and utensils weee available. TV with local stations and cable to plug in your own media box. Good size bathroom and shower, overall size of the place was good for 4 people. Door lock mechanism was nice and gave a good sense of security.

Area was great with easy access to the metro, food, shops etc.

Minor issues

Wifi designated for our room (#7) was not available to select so we hopped on another room’s wifi, our credentials worked for that network. Wifi would cut out late evenings, not sure why. Was not a major issue for us as we had cell data.

Some areas of the room was a bit dusty and the dryer was missing during our stay. Soap is provided for the washer though which was nice.

Be sure to ask what level you book as there is no lift.

Overall

Laurent and Lisa were great hosts and very responsive which was amazing. We would certainly favorite them for our next visit as they host a number of bnb’s in Paris.

photos.caption: Access map to Hotel La Louisiane

name: Double room 2, 3 or 4 beds, Saint-Germain des Prés

reviews.comments: I simply loved the place: unpretentious and yet full of character. Don’t expect silk sheets (although there may well be in some rooms) and jacuzzis as that’s not what Hotel Louisiana is about. Expect narrow winding corridors, nightlife buzzing outside and that very real sense of “Paris in the ‘50s”.  Rooms were just what I wanted as it was a working visit so my colleague and I had our own separate rooms  yet in a shared space. Communication about my requirements were superb. Everything was clean and in the midst of a very cold snap the room was always warm and cosy.  Amazing location, just a few minutes from the nearest metro, lots of restaurants, shops and  the beautiful Jardin du Luxembourg.  Unfortunately, just too short a visit as it was a work visit but I’ll definitely come back here again.

Our main priorities were two connected rooms, a private bathroom, and a central location, and Hotel La Louisiane delivered on all of these. Yes, things like the worn carpet and broken shower head holder were less than dazzling, but altogether we felt the rooms were fair for the price paid. The hotel is directly across the street from a bar that runs all night, so if you’re not a night owl, bring earplugs and an eye mask.  It’s also near some great eateries within walking distance!
Great value and great location.

Great stay, had everything we needed, good location and staff was friendly and helpful with an easy check-in and check-out. I would recommend this to other travelers looking for a solid stay in Paris!
Fantastic location with great restaurants and cafes on the doorstep. Reception staff very friendly and helpful. Room quite basic but adequate.

If you want an eclectic vibe and are a literature nerd, this hotel is perfect. It’s a short walking distance to Shakespeare and Company. Many restaurant choices are nearby. The staff is friendly and helpful.
Great location but black painted walls depressing!

Sparse and simple, comfy beds, great location, fab little sixth floor balcony with all the hubbub of the cafes and bars below. It was noisy at night but we just closed the windows and turned on the air con. The hotel has a cool arty vibe that lifts it out of the ordinary, and the staff were all great.

it's not blockbuster, it's real arthouse cinema!
my "room noir" felt very "film noir"

primaryHost.about:
WARNING: due to this platform technical limitations, sometimes, we can’t open our calendar far in advance for the most popular dates in Paris. You can still ask your booking by writing to us here, using a period already open that we can modify together once our calendar has been adapted for your stay. And if you don't find the right offer for the kind of room(s) you need (single, double, twin, triple, Suite 4 to 6 places), just ask us even using another offer, we will switch it with to the good one.

Hello, my name is Xavier. I have been a true Germanopratin for 52 years. I was born here in Saint-Germain-des-Prés, where I have always lived. Here, I know every street, every restaurant, and every good address in this wonderful neighbourhood, the most pleasant district in Paris.
And exactly in the middle of Quartier Saint-Germain-des-Prés stand the hotel La Louisiane, which has always preserved with humbleness the authentic and poetic spirit of “The Quartier" in its walls and irs rooms, and with its artistic and literary events, especially since luxury boutiques and snobbish places have moved in.
To read more about the hotel and its district last news and lifestyle reviews, and discover our last pictures,  go to our social network book page HotelLaLouisiane : texts are in french but use automatic translation tools.
La Louisiane team do its best to give to our guests the best conditions to stay in Saint-Germain des Prés and Paris left bank Latin Quarter.  My cohosts are Jacek, Charlotte, Julie, Louise, Dominik, Henry and Gauthier.
About me : a literature enthusiast, art lover, history buff, boardgames player, runner (marathon level), and also world globe trotter. Journalist at start and then Internet pioneer in the 1990’s & serial startups founder, I'm now dedicated to the Hotel La Louisiane like my ancestors : I am the 4th manager of my family in a row. La Louisiane is an historical place of Saint-Germain-des-Prés since year One thousand eight hundred and twenty-three (1823). The foundations of the hotel date back to the Roman Empire, and the oldest part to the 15th century. Here we host for two centuries travellers, writers, artists, musicians, entrepreneurs and of course tourists from 117 different countries.
Advertising La Louisiane via AirBnB is first of all a chance to meet with people from all over the world to appreciate cultural diversity : every year, travelers from 120+ countries meet here, in a cosmopolitan and friendly atmosphere.
Looking forward to meeting with you soon in the nicest district of Paris, in the heart of Saint-Germain des Prés, and to helping you enjoy an unforgettable experience!

name: Meslay 4

reviews.comments: Very good!
The apartment was very nice and clean. The location was fantastic, several metro stops away. The street was quiet, and in a safe area. Lovely stay!

The location, host communication and check-in processes were great. Unfortunately, we cut our stay short due to the dinginess and lack of cleanliness of the home. The unit smelled like mildew upon entry, was pretty beat up across the board and was not properly cleaned. There was hair all over the apartment including in the sheets and under the duvet, in the shower, on all the chairs. All of the towels in the home smelled like mildew. The host sent someone to clean the home and I believe they changed the sheets but the rest of the unit was still unclean. On our second day, the ceiling in the bathroom started leaking from the unit above rendering the toilet unusable unless you held a towel over your head.  Lastly, the listing mentions laundry and the machine was pretty filthy and we couldn’t find the light in the laundry room.

The beds were comfortable, location was okay. The place was in need of a deep clean, our socks were filthy walking in the apartment and it lacked very basic necessities (toilet paper, hand soap, dish rags for doing dishes/dish soap, coffee, silverware/napkins/ cups in general, paper towels, etc…..). We asked for a sponge or rag to do dishes in addition to coffee and were left 4 pods to get 3 of us through 4 days and no dish rag at all.

We would NOT stay here again.
reviews.response:
Thank you for your comment but we give toilet paper, hand soap, coffee, paper at the begining of the stay. Id you use all and don't ask me more how can I know ?
if you had a problem with the cleaning why you did't tell me that on the first day ?
It's alway easy to speak after...

reviews.comments: Apartment was good for 3 people. excellent location with great nightlife/restaurants around.  close to numerous metro lines. just a few hiccups regarding the check-in process but hopefully it will be fixed.  other than that I would recommend and stay again myself.

Rue Meslay is very accessible having three metro stations nearby depending on where you’re going. It is uphill, and the apartment is in the middle of the street so you’ll do some walking either way :) the place itself is cozy and has most of the amenities. Laurent was particularly helpful and very responsive whenever we asked for assistance with things around the house. Overall a pleasant stay!

I really enjoyed my stay. The AirBnb is clean, well maintained and is located in a great area a few steps from Place de la République which is bustling with cafés, pedestrians, and has several Metro lines. I highly recommend it and would come back.
Great place to stay while in Paris! Close to metro and easy to get around. Exactly as listed, big enough for four people.

Location Location Location! This fantastically located apt opens out quickly to Le Marais. We were three guests and found the space ample, as we were out most of the day and only came home to rest. One of us slept on the very comfortable fold out bed in the living room. The apt is within walking distance of excellent boulangeries, coffee shops, the Republic area and the shops and restaurants of Marais and train lines. The apt itself is nestled inside a beautiful building so you really do get away from the noise and feel rested when you’re there. Laurent and Lisa were extremely helpful and patient and allowed us to store our bags in the apt after our checkout since our train out of the city wasn’t for a few hours. Stay here!

name: Appartement Cosy à Montorgeuil

reviews.comments: Great stay and wonderful location. This small, quiet appartement is well designed to make the most of the space, super cozy, and looks good too. The mezzanine bed ladder requires a bit of skill to climb up and down. Good amenities and pristine cleanliness. Perfect reactivity from the hosts and seamless check-in and out. Recommended.

Sirra and Fanny were fantastic hosts, very responsive and generous. We arrived early (7am) and they made arrangements for us to store our luggage until the apartment was ready, which was so kind. The apartment is cute, but very small. The closet space is minimal, and the ceilings in the kitchen and bathroom are very low. (I am 6’ 1” and worried about hitting my head.) The ladder to the lofted bed took some getting used to. Sirra and Fanny’s responsiveness and helpfulness more than made up for these eccentricities of city living. Also, the in-unit washer/dryer was a major plus!

The apartment was clean and conveniently located in between several major train stations. Great place to stay if you want to be close to restaurants and nightlife as well as major attractions in Paris.

Location was the highlight of the place. Quick responses and detailed instructions were provided for a smooth check in experience. They also provided us with a quick guide which was super helpful.

Plus the place was comfortable and very quiet!

I originally booked Sirra and Fanny’s place for its location. In addition to being perfectly situated, it is charming, cozy, clean and well outfitted. They are attentive, and made great recommendations. The check in/out process is seamless. I already can’t wait to come back and stay here again.
wonderful hosts, and a fantastic place to explore

Everything was enough to be satisfied for us. Sirra is very kind and helpful to stay in Paris. Only one I felt uncomfortable is size of house especially shower booth but I was able to understand because it is located in region 2. Location is perfect (safe and convenient) and the property is very clean.

Location, location, location…this is a wonderful place. Everything you want to see is within a 15 minute walk and the best food is just meters out the front door. If you are staying in Paris, stay here and make sure to visit A La Main a stellar restaurant and wine bar just downstairs…
Also the hosts were excellent with communication and the place was exactly as described in the listing….we would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We had the most beautiful stay in Paris and the big part of it was our gracious hosts. Sirra and Fanny. They made sure we were missing nothing during our stay and all details of a home away from
Home were carefully curated. Will return each time with much pleasure. Thank you again. Gabby and Eric

name: Magnifique appartement au pied du sacré coeur -5p

reviews.comments:
The pros: location
The cons: late check-in due to cleaning staff at apartment upon arrival, slow host replies and host wanted to communicate outside of Airbnb platform, shower drain clogged with subsequent flooding into 4 rooms, Nespresso machine missing and apparently being fixed, no AC or fan available during hottest days of the year so far, no trash bins or hand soap in bathrooms, no extra toilet paper in apartment.
Super recoemnded, well located just a few letter away from the metro and scare coeur
Excellent accommodation in a great location. Easy check in, apartment was clean and very comfortable. Thank you!

My sister and I had a wonderful stay. The location was sensational and the beautiful patisserie muscles across the road was fabulous to wake up to every morning to get a coffee and a croissant. The apartment itself was exceptionally clean well laid out. It was also on the ground floor which was a huge plus for us without baggage. The apartments kitchen had very basic equipment, however, when you’re in Paris you tend to be going out and about anyway to the most wonderful cafes and restaurants in the area. We would not hesitate to stay here again.
great place for your visit to Paris. Pretty close the Sacre Coeur, marvellous location, the house is clean, what you see in the Photos is what you get.
Great location for a stay in Paris. Close to lots of shops and restaurants.

This is a clean, well situated apartment.  It has all of the basic amenities that you expect out of an apartment (washer, wifi, tv's, etc).  The beds were comfortable and we were able to get a good night's sleep.  The location is a couple of blocks from the metro stations and Sacre Coeur.  Communication with the host was good.  The apartment could use a few more amenities and instructions, and the apartment lacked natural light.  Otherwise if you're looking for a good location to drop your stuff off and sleep this works well.
Awesome!

Great location.  Flat directly on the street so if you don't want passers by looking in you have to keep the shutters closed and keep the lights on! Flat wasn't  cleaned when we got there and took a couple of hours to sort out. No cups in the kitchen! I bought a corkscrew and left it in the drawer for the next guests. Nice comfy beds, good showers, convenient for shopping and eating, easy metro access. Probably a great flat for people who want to eat out mainly

reviews.comments: Shani, has a nice comfortable apartment well equipped, and provided some nice snacks. It’s located in quite neighborhood, close to the metro and followed up with me to see if I needed anything. I will definitely stay here on my next trip to Paris.
very communicative host and solid location!
Very nice place I would recommend

Shani's place is perfect - it's cozy and comfortable, in a great location within walking distance of lots of cool places, and near public transit, too. We really felt home during our stay! Thank you Mehdi for everything! We would love to stay here again in our next trip to Paris!

The apartment is in a highly desirable neighborhood and worth the price paid. More importantly, we found it to be centrally located to most of the places we visited, which made site seeing easier. Great!

name: Beauquartier Marais - Le Loft 51

reviews.comments: Wonderful location, beautifully designed and spacious apartment!

- The bed is not a queen bed, but rather two smaller beds put together. This was the largest issue for me as we had paid a premium and felt the bed was cheap / not one bed but two
- There is little privacy in the living room, no blinds or shielding of the sun, you’ll have to change in the small bathroom or small room or in the open for others to see
- Not much storage for your items, no cupboards for clothing, hangars can be requested but at a limited amount
+ Room gets bed made
+ good location
+ responsive host but I suggest you call over message
+ a/c works but broke on our last day and night
+ bath is great

Just note this is a very small unit, otherwise good time.
belle appartement bien situé

localizedReview.comments: nice apartment in a good location

primaryHost.about:
Beauquartier vous apporte à la fois ce que l’hôtellerie haut de gamme fait de mieux et ce que notre propre maison nous assure : confort absolu, qualité de service et indépendance totale. Nos suites et appartements, situés dans les quartiers les plus emblématiques, sont conçus avec précision, décorés avec goût et équipés dans le moindre détail.

Chez Beauquartier, nous sommes passionnés par notre ville, Paris, qu’il nous tient à cœur de vous faire découvrir et aimer. Vous trouverez dans les appartements tous nos conseils avisés pour ne rien rater de la ville ni du quartier. Que vous voyagiez seul(e) ou en famille, en vacances ou pour les affaires, vous trouverez toujours chez nous un deuxième chez vous.

name: GuestReady - Old-world-charm Near Paris Zoo

reviews.comments:
The perfect Paris apartment for my first time visit to the city. The apartment was a lovely sanctuary at the end of long days of sightseeing, set in a lovely area, everything you needed close by, many choice for transportation into the city, spacious and clean and quiet.
Just lovely and if I was ever fortunate enough to get to Paris again I would definitely book here and or recommend it to any friends
reviews.response: Hi Alana, it was an honour to have you as our guests. We are delighted that the apartment met all of your expectations. We hope the services were just as pleasant and that you had a great time in the city. Overall, we are looking forward to seeing you again!

reviews.comments: Overall it is not bad for a short stay. It would be better if the bathroom is improved with a more convenient door and the kitchen utensils are more clean.
reviews.response: Hi Clara , it was lovely hosting you. Thank you for expressing and sharing your thoughts. Nevertheless, your feedback is much appreciated, as it will assist me in enhancing my service.

reviews.comments: Living area is spacious, comfortable and tastefully appointed. There are plentiful high quality linens. Wi-Fi & tv ( Netflix, Amazon, Apple) work well. The salle de bain is functional but very tiny. Not a problem for us, but large people will find it difficult to manœuvre in. The listing states that cooking basics are provided but there was no salt, pepper, sugar, dish soap, paper towels - things that are customarily provided in Airbnbs. Cooking possibilities are limited as there is no oven. There are two match lit burners that work nicely. If the tiny salle de bain is not a problem for you I recommend this  lodging. The neighborhood is quiet and seems very safe, yet there are several very good brosseries and traiteurs within a five-minute walk as well as fine boulangeries, fromageries and the like.
reviews.response: Hi Joe! It was a pleasure to have you as our guests. We are so glad the apartment was everything you needed it to be and that you enjoyed your time there. We hope the service given was equally as pleasant and that you had a wonderful time in the city. All in all, we certainly look forward to welcoming you again.

Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, clean and prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.
We're looking forward to meeting you and are always ready to answer any of your questions!

GuestReady Team

Perfect location, has everything you need and the air conditioning allows for a good nights rest.  We loved this room and will remember it fondly when we think of Paris.
Hotel services were great.  People were very friendly and helpful.  Location was also great. Room was a bit small but I understand the location is high value.

Very Clean, amazing building, breakfast was perfect!!!! And of course so closer to the tower Eiffel and one block from Les Invalides Rotunda!!!!!
We will be back with our kids!!!! Thank you.

primaryHost.about:
Un seul mot d’ordre à l’hôtel : votre satisfaction !

Chaque membre de l’équipe a d’abord été recruté pour ses qualités humaines et s’efforcera de vous servir chaque jour dans la joie et la bonne humeur ! C’est la raison pour laquelle, je crois pouvoir affirmer qu’il règne à l’hôtel une ambiance particulière dont nous sommes fiers. Vous faire partager notre passion pour Paris, nos coup de cœurs, nos bonnes adresses, satisfaire vos envies, parler de choses et d’autres … Voilà ce qui nous donne le sourire au quotidien !

Bienvenue chez vous !

name: Elegant room next to the Champs-Elysées w/ free breakfast

reviews.comments: Nice place with out nice .
Great charismatic little hotel in walking distance to the Arc de Triomphe.

This was an incredible place to stay in Paris. It’s close to the Arc de Triomphe and there is a metro close by. The breakfast was delicious and was a great start to each day. I would definitely stay here again!
Hidden old school hotel. Super friendly staff. Clean rooms. Well priced.
Perfectly located, had a very lovely stay here. Great value and a nice breakfast too
Less than ten minutes walk from Arc de triomph. Clean and neat rooms. I enjoyed my stay here.

We both had a lovely stay at this hotel. The location is excellent and the surrounding food markets add so much character to the stay. The free breakfast was a nice added touch. The staff were also all very accommodating.
Small, cute place with friendly staff. Room was small but very tidy and pretty. Great location in a small courtyard but yet very close to Arc de Triomphe. Very good breakfast, uncomplicated check-in.
Great hotel in the middle of Paris near a lot of sites. Very clean.  Bed was very comfortable.  Everyone at the desk was very nice.  No complaints.

primaryHost.about: Machefert Group est un groupe hôtelier familial présent à Paris, Saint-Tropez et Marrakech. Fondé en 1992 sous le nom Les Hôtels de Paris, le Groupe a élargi ses horizons à l'occasion de son 25ème anniversaire et rassemble aujourd'hui  une collection d'hôtels, de resorts, de restaurants, de bars, de clubs, de spas, d'espaces de travail et d'incubateurs de startup.
